availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Fitzgerald (Louisville, Kentucky, laborer and teamster)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, laborer and teamster. Native of Ireland. Married to Katherine Lee Fitzgerald in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 13, 1861. Laborer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1858. Laborer in Louisville in 1861. Teamster in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 519.
